body: In hentai, incest is wincest. The loli is drawn well and is cute. A bit too much of a rectangle, but it'll do. I didn't fap to this actually. I was just looking for the right one, and ended up reading this whole thing without even unzipping my pants. Unfortunately, that means it wasn't the right one. 5/10. Decent, but could use more 'realness'.
